titles.title: Community Services Block Grant Amendments of 1994

A bill to amend the Community Services Block Grant Act to establish a new Community Initiative Program to carry out economic development activities in economically distressed communities, to make other amendments to the Act, and for other purposes.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S3074-3075)
Read twice and referred to the Committee on Banking.
Senate Committee on Banking discharged by Unanimous Consent.
Referred to the Committee on Labor and Human Resources.

committee.name: Senate Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs

bill.summary: 3/16/1994--Introduced. Community Services Block Grant Amendments of 1994 - Amends the Community Services Block Grant Act to authorize a community initiative grant program to carry out economic development activities in economically distressed communities. Extends the authorization of appropriations for the community services block grant program. Obligates funds for the community initiatives program.
